Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
December 2023 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

As we wrap up 2023, we want to express our sincere thanks for your dedication and hard work. Together, we've achieved great strides that pave the way for a brighter future for Justia. May your days be filled with warmth from family and friends. Amidst the festivities, prioritize your well-being for a safe and healthy holiday. Wishing you all a joyful holiday season and looking forward to creating more successful achievements together in the upcoming year.

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Short Videos (Legal Content). We have recently produced and uploaded a new short video discussing Human Trafficking under Mexican Law on our Justia YouTube Channel.

Justia Mexico Portal Content Updates. We have recently updated the content of the Federal Civil Code, adding to the growing collection of updated laws on our portal.

Justia Daily Opinion Summaries. We have transitioned to AI-assisted generation for Justia Daily Opinion Summaries, signifying a significant process optimization. This allows us to cover all courts moving forward, ensuring comprehensive coverage for the benefit of our users.

Justia Connect. We remain dedicated to improving CLE offerings! We have expanded support for South Carolina and Texas CLE Courses & Credits. Additionally, Justia Connect users can easily add upcoming webinars to their calendars, along with other helpful updates.

Justia Elevate. We have introduced several features for our Justia Elevate clients, including support for external blog feeds and updates to stripes, blocks, and site settings. Furthermore, a recent backend optimization will enhance overall performance as we integrate more sites into the system.

QA Automation. We have launched the initial version of automated QA for both Justia Legal Dictionary and our Helpdesk system. Additionally, we've introduced visual regression support for Justia Legal Dictionary, our Justia Company portal, and Justia Business Contracts. Finally, we have implemented other behind-the-scenes features to enhance our web performance and security issues coverage.

IT Team. This month, we performed multiple server maintenance tasks, aligning with required updates from AWS and making infrastructure adjustments to optimize costs.

Data. We compiled and presented a report on the conversion performance of Justia Connect Pro and Justia Lawyer Directory profiles, providing valuable insights compared to our premium placement users.

Justia Lawyer Directory. We have implemented a notification for premium placement users at the 10-month mark to share highlights of their performance in our Justia Lawyer Directory.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • Case Summaries. Our ongoing efforts involve advancing a tool that utilizes artificial intelligence (AI) to provide concise summaries of cases within state and federal courts. Additionally, the tool was designed to identify the specific practice areas associated with each case.
  • Enhanced Justia Legal Dictionary. We have incorporated an extensive array of new terms into our recently launched Justia Legal Dictionary, with a particular focus on intricate subjects such as patents, immigration, and commodity futures trading.
  • New York Car Accidents Content. We generated a series of pages explaining the regulations related to car accidents in New York, aiming to enhance our presence in local search results.

Justia Pet News

Curious Neyla

Meet Neyla, a 3-year-old dog with a predilection for curiosity. She enjoys exploring new scents, discovering different types of food, and investigating various items around the house. Neyla takes it upon herself to inspect every package that arrives, ensuring all is well. However, she harbors a fear of babies and thunder. Neyla enjoys gazing out the window, napping on the fluffiest pillows, and going for leisurely walks.

— Silvia de los Santos

Justia INTERN Spotlight

Antonio Gonzalez is Participating in an Exchange Program in Spain

Antonio Gonzalez, an intern on the Front-End Team, is enhancing his skills through an academic exchange program in Spain. He is currently enrolled at the University of Castilla La Mancha, studying project management and electronic commerce as part of the engineering degree program. Additionally, he is pursuing studies in audit management and security in the master's program.

DID YOU KNOW?

Just Meet Up! Last Session of 2023

The energy was incredible at our last Just Meet Up! of 2023. On November 22nd, we had a full house! We dived into a super interesting discussion led by Claudia Duque on AI's legal and ethical aspects. She connected with the audience, making exploring the intricate dimensions of artificial intelligence insightful and engaging.

Vasu Chatted About Justia With Prashanth Shenoy

In a recent meeting in Mangaluru, Vasu Kappettu spoke with Prashanth Shenoy Katpady, the CTO and Co-founder of UniCourt. They discussed Justia's impressive evolution into the most visited legal website in the United States. Vasu Kappettu expounded on the vital contribution of the Justia Team in reaching this milestone by providing free and public access to legal information. Furthermore, Vasu delved into the strategies and initiatives that have elevated Justia.com to the forefront of online legal resources. The discussion evolved into a meaningful exchange that underscored the crucial intersection between legal technology and accessibility.

You can watch the full interview here

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

The Joneses

Available on Apple TV

"The Joneses," released in 2009, was a film that anticipated its era, showcasing influencer marketing before the Instagram boom. Widely regarded as a "must-see" for all marketers, the movie narrates the tale of a group of stealth marketers and skilled undercover salespeople infiltrating a high-income suburb to promote products discreetly.

— Hector Lugo
